sentences: Taat käib sirgena ja tusasena mööda põldu edasi-tagasi, veab panemeid, heidab kangel käel seemet.
Parem on enne külvamist ära pana.
Farmer took the panem with him to the field.
context: Pane is an Estonian agricultural term referring to a part of a plow, specifically the moldboard or plowshare. It's used in the context of farming activities and refers to the metal blade that cuts through soil and turns it over during plowing operations.
